item.name: Harris Organic
item.description: Owners Duncan and Deb Harris say Harris is the only organic winery in the Swan Valley (certified as such in September 2006). The wines are made from estate vineyards (muscadelle, chenin blanc, chardonnay, pedro ximinez, verdelho, shiraz, muscat a petit grains, muscat blanc and muscat rouge), producing organic table wines and preservative-free dessert wines. Exports (less than 10 cases per shipment) to the US and EU.
